page.title: 11Recreation 1
page.content: {Sport} The promenade at Sandside provides good facilities for anglers, and the farms and marshland across the estuary attract wildfowlers. The river currents and the fast-rising tides are treacherous and preclude most water sports. A playing field provides for football, hockey and cricket, and badminton occurs in the village hall. {Formalised Outdoor Activities}There is a Gardening Association and a number of Fetes and Sports Events organised by school and church groups, together with a Playing Field Association. The Sunday School includes a Young Explorers Group. {Informal Outdoor Activities}The natural environment gives wide scope to the rambler, natural historian and bird watcher. The views and sunsets are captured by the artist and photographer.
